Sentencas: The cathode performance of various LSCM-based composites for high temperature H2O electrolysis has been studied by examining their electrochemical behavior under current loading using three-electrode electrolysis cells with Pt as counter and reference electrodes.
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2

Sentencas: Experimental results among pure LSCM, LSCM-GDC, LSCM-YSZ and LSCM-(GDC-YSZ) have shown that LSCM-GDC exhibits the highest H2O electrolysis performance.
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2

Sentencas: The ratio between LSCM and GDC is further optimized and it is shown that the LSCM-GDC with 50-50 wt.% for each component exhibits the highest performance.
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2

Sentencas: Benchmarking with a 60-40 wt.% Ni-YSZ cathode have shown that the optimized LSCM-GDC cathode exhibits better performance for H2O electrolysis with a lower area specific resistance.
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2

Sentencas: Under a cathodic current of -0.1 A cm(-2), the optimized LSCM-GDC cathode shows much slower degradation, about 10 times slower as compared to the Ni-YSZ cathode when exposed to 10 ppm of SO2 for up to 72h.
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2

Sentencas: All the above electrochemical tests have been conducted at 800 degrees C and 70/30 pH(2)O/pH(2).
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2

Sentencas: Without the use of reducing agent, the optimized LSCM-GDC cathode also shows promising performance for co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2 at high current densities and stable performance with 5 ppm of SO2 in the feedstock gas.
Titulo: Sulfur Tolerant LSCM-based Composite Cathode for High Temperature Electrolysis/Co-electrolysis of H2O and CO2
